description: Indicates whether eye gaze is missing
Time in ms from trial start, relative to time zero
Indicates type of trial, mixed-language or single-language
Index of trial, increases by 1 for each subsequent trial
Index of trial of a particular type, increases by 1 for each subsequent trial of that type
Unique identifier for a particular trial of a particular type for a particular participant
Indicates whether participant was looking at the target, 0 = no, 1 = yes
Indicates whether participant was looking at the distractor, 0 = no, 1 = yes

level_values: Bear, Sheep, Dog, Bunny, Cow, Froggy, Duck, Butterfly, Fish, Monkey

description: Participant's total vocabulary across all languages
Indicates whether the study language is the participant's dominant or non-dominant language
